colorScheme.title: Color Scheme
colorScheme.text: Choose a light or dark color scheme to personalize your experience. You can also select "System" to choose the color scheme for the app based on your operating system settings.

language.title: Language
language.text: Choose your preferred language for the app.

storage.title: Storage
storage.text: Delete saved data to free up storage space.
storage.dangerZoneText: Changes in this area cannot be undone!

modals.confirmResetAppTitle: Are you sure you want to reset the app?
modals.confirmResetAppText: This will reset the app to its original state. This can help resolve issues encountered while using the app.
